body: This builds on top of #19031, adding one more commit to complete the TORv3 puzzle. The dependency to #19031 is because if we create a TORv3 hidden service before #19031 is merged we will not be able to advertise it by gossiping. So, this PR is draft until all of #19031 is merged. Available for early review and testing.

Linter fails on missing newline here.
```
$ test/lint/lint-logs.sh
All calls to LogPrintf() and LogPrint() should be terminated with \n
```
